InstructionData.Title: portableGasMixer
InstructionData.Description: precision gas mixer IC adapted for portable hookups â€‹
InstructionData.Author: Rizzard of Oz
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias activationLever d0 alias outputAnalyzer d1
alias leverState r7
alias outputPressure r8
define purgeVents -1129453144 define gasValves -1280984102
start: s activationLever Open 0 awaitInitialization: sb gasValves On 0 sb purgeVents On 1 l leverState activationLever Open beq leverState 1 initialization yield j awaitInitialization
initialization: sb purgeVents On 0 sb gasValves On 1 calculationLoop:
#check for end conditions l leverState activationLever Open beq leverState 0 start l outputPressure outputAnalyzer Pressure bgeal outputPressure 19000 start
yield j calculationLoop
